content.name: p
children: Learn how to get Beset set up in your project in under five minutes or it's free.

attributes.title: Installation
attributes.description: Step-by-step guides to setting up your system and installing the library.

attributes.title: Content Control
attributes.description: Control your content via our processing api

attributes.title: API reference
attributes.description: Learn how to submit transcription jobs from your servers.

content.name: p
children: Installing Beset is as simple import which instantiates an floating player that will auto-detect the content on the page using the html.

content.name: Fence
children:
<script type="module">
      import('https://beset-js.s3.amazonaws.com/BesetJS.es.js').then(async ({BesetWidget}) => {
          const widget = new BesetWidget({
            publicKey: "YOUR_API_KEY",
            inlinePlayerElement: document.getElementById("target-dom_element")
          })
          await widget.mount();
      })
</script>

content.name: p
children: Configuration is simple you can pass a bunch of configuration options for styling and detecting events like below. Read about it in the

content.name: Fence
children:
<script type="module">
      import('https://beset-js.s3.amazonaws.com/BesetJS.es.js').then(async ({BesetWidget}) => {
          const widget = new BesetWidget({
            // ...
            handlers: {
              onPlay: () => { /** your code */ }
            }
            notifiers: {
              onStartPlayback: () => { /** your code */ }
            }
          })
          await widget.mount();
      })
</script>

content.name: p
children: The Beset team is here to make sure you succeed and can get your issues solved ASAP! If you're having any problems at all don't be afraid to reach out
. We promise the feedback will be speedy!
